text.autoconfig.Tabby.title: Tabby Config
text.autoconfig.Tabby.option.general.max: The maximum players that can be rendered, set to 0 for the max to always be the current online player count
The maximum rows that can be rendered, this value is not used if adaptive is set to true
text.autoconfig.Tabby.option.general.ada: Set to true for the amount of rows to adapt based off how many players there are
The amount to divide the players online by to determine how many rows will be rendered when adaptive is set to true
Where x is the value of maxCount and y is the adaptiveDivisor value
text.autoconfig.Tabby.option.misc.custom: Set to true to enable custom highlight colours for specific names in tab
Change header to a custom string, leave blank for no change, write null for nothing to be rendered
Change footer to a custom string, leave blank for no change, write null for nothing to be rendered
text.autoconfig.Tabby.option.misc.reload: Keybinding to reload certain Tabby features
Set to true to enable specific debug logs
